Publish.LongDescription:
## Traffic Lights Enhancement - 1.4.2f1 Hotfix (Unofficial)
Unofficial **compatibility hotfix** for *Traffic Lights Enhancement* to run on **Cities: Skylines II 1.4.2f1** ("Bike" patch).
Based on the original **0.3.0** release by **slyh**. This build only adds robustness and logging improvements so the mod does not crash the game on newer versions.
**Traffic light logic and UI behaviour are unchanged.**
### Changes in 0.3.1
* Improved stability on game startup - initialization code wrapped in try/catch * Safer handling of internal ECS queries to prevent crashes when game internals change * Additional diagnostic logging for easier debugging across patches * No gameplay or UI changes - identical behaviour to 0.3.0
### Compatibility
* Tested with **Cities: Skylines II 1.4.2f1** ("Bike" patch) * Should work identically to 0.3.0 on older versions
### Original Author and License
This mod is an **unofficial fork** of the original "Traffic Lights Enhancement" by **slyh**.
* Original repository: https://github.com/slyh/Cities2-TrafficLightsEnhancement * Original Paradox Mods page: https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/78960/Windows * Distributed under the **MIT License**
Guide available at: https://github.com/slyh/Cities2-TrafficLightsEnhancement/tree/master/GUIDE.md
**Warning:** This mod stores extra data in your saves. Once removed, traffic lights should revert to default settings when a road update is triggered, but this cannot be guaranteed.
